rooms.description: Open space with a decorative bohemian theme.
Adjacent to the living area, offering a relaxed dining experience.
Fully equipped kitchen with a modern yet bohemian touch.
Compact and accessible bathroom for guests.

openings.location: near living room and dining area

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom featuring a large balcony for morning sun exposure, designed according to Vastu principles.
Bohemian themed bedroom with its own balcony and calming decor.
Cozy bedroom with a dedicated balcony, ensuring fresh air and light per Vastu alignment.
Multi-use loft area that can serve as a study or guest space with bohemian decor.
Shared bathroom for the loft area.

features: large panoramic balcony with bohemian elements
